text:
Doutore LLC | Front-end Developer (AngularJS) | REMOTE | Part-time

We're an EMR software company focused on the Brazilian Market. We're bootstraped and we currently have hundreds of active users. We're looking for an expert in Angular to help us with some key challenges + advices (we initially developed everything in Ruby on Rails, with no front-end JS framework; now we're migrating the front-end to AngularJS). We're looking for probably 5-hour week max.

email us at angular [at) doutore com
